content: For the third quarter ended September 30, 2022, Hudson recorded revenues of $89.5 million, an increase of 48% compared to revenues of $60.6 million in the comparable 2021 period. During the third quarter of 2022, the company paid down an incremental $31 million of term loan debt, resulting from improved performance and increased cash flow, thus reducing its leverage ratio to 0.41:1 for the trailing 12 months ended September 30, 2022, declining significantly from a leverage ratio of 2.35:1 for the trailing 12 months ended September 30, 2021.
